name: parcel-delivery-system
description: Parcel Delivery System - Full Stack Application

scripts.start:all: npm run start:backend & npm run start:web & wait
scripts.start:all:mobile: npm run start:backend & npm run start:web & npm run start:mobile & wait
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run seed
scripts.setup:run: npm run stop && npm run install:all && npm run seed && npm run setup:mobile:env && npm run start:all:mobile
scripts.setup:mobile:env: cd mobile && CURRENT_IP=$(ipconfig getifaddr en0 2>/dev/null || ifconfig | grep 'inet ' | grep -v 127.0.0.1 | awk '{print $2}' | head -1) && if [ -n "$CURRENT_IP" ]; then echo "EXPO_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://${CURRENT_IP}:5000/api" > .env && echo "✅ Mobile .env set with IP: $CURRENT_IP"; else echo "⚠️ Could not detect IP for mobile"; fi
scripts.setup:run:web: npm run stop && npm run install:all && npm run seed && npm start
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:web && npm run install:mobile
scripts.restart: npm run stop && sleep 2 && npm run start
